slides.title: Beautiful Festoon Light Installations
slides.description: Festoon lighting hire with complete install and pack down. Comprehensive design process to make sure your event looks as beautiful as possible!

slides.title: Corporate Event Lighting Hire
slides.description: Promote your brand or product in the best light with high-quality corporate event lighting hire. Tailored designs to your brand's event.

slides.title: Fairy Light Hire for Weddings
slides.description: Fairy light canopy installations for weddings can make or break the event's design. Trust the experts at Lume Hire to make your wedding pop!

slides.title: Creative Lighting Installations
slides.description: Experts at quickly creating large scale temporary lighting structures. Hire including installation and pack down, to make your special day perfect.

slides.title: Large Event Festoon Light Hire
slides.description: Offering packages of upto 200m of festoon lighting, for large events needing to light areas of over 100m2 or crowd sizes between 800-1000 pax.

slides.title: Wide Range of Event Services
slides.description: We offer a wide range of event services and event hire. A wide range of lights available, overhead rigging and equipment, DMX control and projection mapping.

slides.title: Wedding Fairy Light Canopy Hire
slides.description: Create a beautiful atmosphere for pre-drinks or for your venue entrance with our impressive fairy light canopies. Creating beautiful backdrops for your wedding.

slides.title: Custom Fairy Light Canopies
slides.description: We design all our lighting layouts to every event. Working with any other AV companies or providers, and able to create floor plans if needed.

slides.title: DMX Lighting Hire and Control
slides.description: Let our Lighting Designers control the whole room's lighting and look on the fly. Adjusting to the feel of the music and the vibe of the minute.

slides.title: Complete Custom Light Shows
slides.description: Offering complete custom lighting shows, taking control of all screens and lights in a room for a comprehensive custom show.

slides.title: Water-Proof Light Hire for Events
slides.description: All of our equipment is IP64 rated at minimum, making sure our equipment is never a reason for an electrical fault. Always up to date with test and tag.
